channel.title: Casey, Trevor, & Myself accidentally light our friend's garage on fire (video)
channel.description:
This guy we know went out of town to visit some relatives, so Casey, Trevor, and I all went into his house to set off a smoke bomb in his garage, because it would be funny, or something, and we could get it on tape. There was no apparent reason for doing it, though. We just hoped it would be funny.
then we realized that there was fire coming out instead of smoke. This wasn't good, because there is gasoline everywhere in his garage.
all is well now, and we can just look back and laugh about it.
oh, btw...
Trevor lit it.
I filmed.
Casey ran away screaming "oh shit! shit!"
enjoy: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BsOYMUD0kFs
Credit: Casey & Trevor (for forcing me to go along & film it)

@nyx1 wrote:

xstrxpurez:

lol me too i remember back when me and a few friends were shooting fire works off in Texas and in a ally in Amarillo and it was in september… and the grass was dry as hell… we lit roman candles off and started a 7 block ally fire… we got in so much damn trouble… but haha we called the fire dept. by our self…

lol wow. that’s intense…

item.title: Casey, Trevor, & Myself accidentally light our friend's garage on fire (video)
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“xstrxpurez, post:19, topic:231722”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=305229.msg2447116#msg2447116 date=1221785146]
rofl. This reminds me of stupid shit me and my friends do. I’m sure it reminds everyone the same thing.
[/quote]
lol me too i remember back when me and a few friends were shooting fire works off in Texas and in a ally in Amarillo and it was in september… and the grass was dry as hell… we lit roman candles off and started a 7 block ally fire… we got in so much damn trouble… but haha we called the fire dept. by our self…[/quote]I remember when me and my friends were throwing stuff in the middle of the street. Then when i threw this pop can, it just stood straight up and sat in the middle. My friends and I didn’t think anything, and later forgot about it. Then we started throwing more stuff, and then a car hit that pop can, swerved into a complete U turn and started chasing us down. Fastest I’ve ran in my life.

[quote=".nyx., post:17, topic:231722"][quote author=xstrxpurez link=topic=305229.msg2447107#msg2447107 date=1221784968]
lol, i would love to be in Amsterdam filming a video for something… that would be the shit walking around and every place you look you see tits or a pussy… lol then getting high and shit… ppl would be like oh shit i am goin there!
[/quote]

lmao yeah it was great. thug-life is lucky, since the legal drinking age is 18. idk why america’s so tight up in their ass about that.[/quote]

[quote=“xstrxpurez, post:19, topic:231722”]ya ik what u mean… they think oh everyone will die… blah blah blah… really who cares? if we wana smoke, get high, sniff coke, or drink… we will do it… nothing can stop us lol[/quote]Except the law.

Read full topic
